phrases: They are all working very hard.
This is the inside of a human body.
WHITE BLOOD CELLS (NEUTROPHILS): Their main task is to eliminate foreign substances from outside, such as bacteria and viruses.
It is dissolving the lumps of nutrients.
RED BLOOD CELLS: They carry oxygen and carbon dioxide using blood circulation.
STOMACH: Stores food that is been swallowed, sterilizing it with the gastric acid that it secretes from its walls.
In addition, it turns the food into mush thanks to pepsin, a digestive enzyme, carrying out the first step of digestion.
Stores food that is been swallowed,
sterilizing it with the gastric acid that it secretes from its walls.
In addition, it turns the food into mush thanks to pepsin, a digestive enzyme,
carrying out the first step of digestion.
So this is how food gets digested, huh?
See, since I have been using all my energy to learn my routes,
I have never really gotten a good look at how this all works!
So this is the first time I have seen it all getting dissolved like this!
A radar-like device that can detect bacteria and the like.
Red Blood Cell, let us pick up this conversation later!
No, no, it is not that crucial anyway.
All right, if you do not want to die, just hand over those nutrients!
I will not let you lay a finger on these blood cells or nutrients, got that?
What kind of an attack is that?
If I would run into Macrophage, I would have been a goner.
Who knew you would be such a weakling?
EOSINOPHIL: A type of White Blood Cell.
Said to comprise only a small percent of all White Blood Cells.
Multiplies during allergic reactions or parasitic infections.
Though weak, Eosinophils are capable of phagocytosis, just like other White Blood Cells.
A type of White Blood Cell.
Said to comprise only a small percent of all White Blood Cells.
Multiplies during allergic reactions or parasitic infections.
Eosinophils are capable of phagocytosis just like other White Blood Cells.
Yeah, we are two White Blood Cells who grew up inside the same bone marrow.
White Blood Cell, do you need a tissue?
Is she really a White Blood Cell?
But she lost to a germ!
Are there really White Blood Cells like her?
But she is got this giant weapon.
Cannot she take out a mere cell for heaven's sake?
Exterminating bacteria is not a White Blood Cell's only job.
This one has all kinds of other tasks.
They are only speaking the truth.
It does not really bother me.
It is coming from the stomach!
But what is up with these tremors?
MAST CELL (FAT CELL): Releases chemical mediators such as histamines and leukotrienes in reaction to the production of excessive immunoglobulin.
Despite being known as Fat Cells, they have nothing to do with fat.
Releases chemical mediators such as histamines and leukotrienes
in reaction to the production of excessive immunoglobulin.
Despite being known as Fat Cells, they have nothing to do with fat.
HISTAMINE: A chemical substance released by Mast Cells upon recognizing foreign substances or injury.
A chemical substance released by Mast Cells upon recognizing foreign substances or injury.
The wheels of fortune are already turning.
Can the capriccio leading to destruction be stopped, I wonder.
O sorrowful warriors who must bear the cross known as peace...
BASOPHIL: A type of White Blood Cell.
Said to comprise less than 1 of all White Blood Cells.
When a Basophil encounters a specific pathogen, it releases histamines and the like, thereby triggering an allergic reaction.
It creates a substance that will draw Neutrophils and Eosinophils to the affected area.
Though Basophils are thought to have immunity-related functions, as well, this has yet to be sufficiently determined.
A type of White Blood Cell.
Said to comprise less than 1 of all White Blood Cells.
When a Basophil encounters a specific pathogen,
it releases histamines and the like, thereby triggering an allergic reaction.
that will draw Neutrophils and Eosinophils to the affected area.
Though Basophils are thought to have immunity-related functions, as well,
this has yet to be sufficiently determined.
By the violent hands of a creature who knows not love,
our paradise has been transformed into a chaotic nation where control is non-existent.
There is no other way to end this tragedy but to ask for your help.
Y-You mean we have been invaded by too much bacteria to take out with gastric juice?
Everybody, it seems that we have been invaded by bacteria.
Please evacuate the area at once.
Everybody, it seems that we have been invaded by bacteria.
Please evacuate the area at once.
There seems to have been a bacterial food poisoning outbreak.
Those in the area, please escape now.
ENTERITIS VIBRIO: A bacteria that normally resides in sea water.
Consuming seafood contaminated by this bacteria can lead to contagious enteritis vibrio food poisoning, accompanied by severe stomach pain and the like.
A bacteria that normally resides in sea water.
Consuming seafood contaminated by this bacteria
can lead to contagious enteritis vibrio food poisoning
accompanied by severe stomach pain and the like.
The phone's ringing off the hook!
We are detecting powerful tremors near the stomach wall!
A mass of bacteria is invading!
Everybody, this is Helper T Cell.
We are being invaded by a giant horde of bacteria from a colony infesting raw fish.
Please evacuate the area at once.
Please evacuate the area at once.
there is a heck of a lot of damage to the stomach wall.
We are being invaded by Enteritis Vibrio!
Those of you nearby, please evacuate at once!
It is going to be just you and me until backup gets here!
Give us a hand over here!
Damn you, you are in my way!
I am about to be eaten!
Do not rush in like that!
You do not stand a chance against that one!
I am going to start by eating you!
His tremendous will has led the sorrowful warrior to sacrifice himself.
To seal away the corruption of the world,
it is time to let the bloody requiem ring out.
I-It is all because my phagocytic effects are so weak.
PHAGOCYTIC EFFECTS: When phagocytes such as Neutrophils absorb bacteria and other foreign substances, and break them down.
I made you go through all this insanity alone.
When I am a White Blood Cell myself...
Why is that Eosinophil here anyway?
I was harsh on you because it was an emergency.
I told you that you did not have a chance, but that was...
I already know I am a weakling.
It appears that the bacteria you were notified about earlier
Those of you in the area may return to work without any worries.
Let us get back to work!
It appears that the bacteria you were notified about earlier
Those of you in the area may return to work without any worries.
It is bigger than the one before!
Since there was way too much damage
to the stomach wall for bacterial food poisoning...
Do not tell me this is...
ANISAKIS: A parasite found in marine animals.

When humans consume anisakis-infested seafood raw, in rare cases, they can invade the stomach and the lining of the intestines, causing food poisoning accompanied by severe stomach pain and vomiting (anisakiasis).
A parasite found in marine animals.
When humans consume anisakis-infested seafood raw,
in rare cases, they can invade the stomach and the lining of the intestines,
causing food poisoning accompanied by severe stomach pain and vomiting.
Should the waves of acid spiral and produce a vortex of darkness,
a sea of hellfire will open the forbidden door
and guide the world to chaos.
NAUSEA/EMESIS: A reaction triggered by certain stimuli to the vomiting center located in the medulla oblongata.
The stomach's exit is closed, whereas the entrance is relaxed, causing the stomach to regurgitate its contents.
The diaphragm and abdominal muscles contract, compressing the stomach, and the stomach contents are ejected.
by certain stimuli to the vomiting center located in the medulla oblongata.
The stomach's exit is closed, whereas the entrance is relaxed,
causing the stomach to regurgitate its contents.
The diaphragm and abdominal muscles contract, compressing the stomach,
and the stomach contents are ejected.
It is tearing through the stomach wall!
Even if we cannot kill it, we...
No. 1146 got blasted away by just its voice!
Are not you guys White Blood Cells?
We do not stand a chance!
Wh-What are you talking about, Eosinophil?
How can someone who cannot even beat a germ be a match for that one?
Sure, we called you all kinds of things, like pushover,
but we do not expect you to sacrifice yourself at a time like this!
Did you hear what Eosinophil said?
Wh-Why are not you saying a word?
Do not worry, Red Blood Cell.
It is not like she is heading off to die.
No one can take down that enemy but you!
It is true that as a White Blood Cell, my job is to exterminate bacteria.
But I also have another mission!
EOSINOPHIL'S JOB: When parasites invade the body, Eosinophil protects against parasitic infections by helping to kill them.
Eosinophil protects against parasitic infections by helping to kill them.
The root of all evil has been lured to the abyss of the afterlife.
and we have been released from the curse.
I guess I managed to ward off his invasion somehow.
Thank you for chasing it away, Eosinophil!
I cannot believe how you fought that thing!
I had the wrong idea about you!
Sorry we made fun of you!
I cannot believe I blushed like that in front of everybody!
she was able to save this world from the threat of the anisakis.
Hey, you got totally blasted away just now, huh?
Who would have thought that light would stream in through a hole
I mean our fate as cells...
In other words, mission accomplished, right?
This is bad, White Blood Cell!
There is somebody weird going, Cedar, cedar...
Next episode of Cells at Work!,
Time to work, time to work!
